Gulp SVG Sprites (7 icons in <symbol> mode)

Files Generated:

  1. svg/symbols.svg

Usage:

  1. Include the contents of the SVG file just after the opening <body> tag.
  2. Paste one of the snippets anywhere into your website.

  • caret-down


    <svg class="icon caret-down"><use xlink:href="#caret-down"></use></svg>

  • check-mark


    <svg class="icon check-mark"><use xlink:href="#check-mark"></use></svg>

  • delete


    <svg class="icon delete"><use xlink:href="#delete"></use></svg>

    <svg class="icon download-button"><use xlink:href="#download-button"></use></svg>
